participant_1.background:
I have other interests that I am putting my time and energy into.
I need the energy of the city to fuel my never-ending work.
I want to be reincarnated as a cat so I can spend my days lazing around in the sun and chasing mice.
I used to only play covers, but now I write my own songs.
i wear a lot of leather.

participant_2.background:
My family works to support my dreams.
i got married when i was young.
i have been on the tv news six times.
my favorite food is raw onion.
my name is mary.

content.text: Hi Mary, I'm participant_1! I like writing music and playing guitar. What's your favorite food?
Hi! Nice to meet you participant_2. I love raw onions. They're so good. I've been on the news six times because of them!
Onions are great! I usually only use them in cooking, but raw onions sound interesting. What do you like about them?
I love the strong flavor. They're really good on sandwiches and salads. My husband and I grow our own onions, so we always have plenty of them on hand.
That's awesome! I've never grown my own food. Is it hard to do?
It's not too hard, but it does take some time and effort. But it's worth it when you get to eat your own fresh produce!
That sounds like a lot of fun. I might have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a great way to get outside and get some exercise.
Yeah, that would be good for me. I'm not very active.
Well, growing your own food is a great way to get started. And it's a lot more fun than going to the gym!
I think you're right! I'm going to have to look into it.
Awesome! Let me know if you have any questions.
